* This page is an example of a blog-style webpage
  * The table below has links to all of the files in a folder specified in the YAML (`contents: slides`)
      * In this case, the links are to the workshop slides, which are the same files linked to from the homepage.  
* The titles and dates shown are the ones specified in the individual .qmd files
* Note that one can sort the files and also search for (filter) files
